data.title: ANSWER YOUR BODY’S NEEDS
data.description: The way ingredients are sourced affects the way we nourish our bodies. Author Mark says we should be aware that artificial flavours need to be healthy, but that artificial flavouring it are an appetite for the foods and nutrients needs getting in the way. This can be reversed by focusing on high-quality ingredients and being mindful as your appetite guides you to consume according to your body’s needs.
data.highlight_description: Sourcing local or more mindful is a good start being more mindful about what you are cooking and eating.
